title: Sales Assistant
job_overview:
We are a leading customised clothing and promotional products supplier in Australian market. It is essential for the candidates to have relative industry experience.

As a Business Development Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving our company's growth by expanding our client base, nurturing relationships with current clients, and re-engaging with previous clients. Your responsibilities will encompass three major parts:

• New Client Development:
• Identify and prospect potential clients within the target market.
• Conduct market research to understand client needs and preferences.
• Develop and implement strategies to acquire new clients and secure new business opportunities.
• Build and maintain a robust pipeline of leads through proactive outreach and networking efforts.
• Current Client Order Follow-Up:
• Act as a primary point of contact for existing clients, ensuring their orders are processed smoothly and efficiently.
• Communicate with clients to gather feedback, address concerns, and ensure satisfaction with our products and services.
• Coordinate with internal teams to fulfil client orders accurately and within agreed timelines.
• Upsell and cross-sell additional products and services to existing clients based on their evolving needs.
• Previous Clients Reactive:
• Revive relationships with previous clients and explore opportunities for re-engagement.
• Conduct outreach campaigns to reconnect with dormant clients and understand reasons for disengagement.
• Propose tailored solutions to win back previous clients and regain their trust and loyalty.
• Follow up on inquiries and requests from previous clients promptly and professionally.

Requirements:

• Proven track record in business development, sales, or account management within the uniform and promotional products industry.
• Strong understanding of the Australian market and its dynamics.
• Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
• Goal-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding targets.
• Proficiency in using ERP software (like Odoo) and other sales tools.
• Flexibility to adapt to Australian Eastern (AEST) working hours.
• Preferable if you could speak fluent Mandarin, but it is not essential
• Preferable if you have Graphic Design skills can design and use Mailchimp, but not essential.


Benefits:
• Competitive salary package with performance-based incentives.
• Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
• Supportive and collaborative team environment.
• Exciting prospects to contribute to the growth and success of a dynamic company.

If you are a driven and results-oriented individual with a passion for business development in the uniform and promotional products industry, we invite you to join our team and make a meaningful impact. Please submit your resume and cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this position. We look forward to hearing from you!
